categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Khoris was a male Human Jedi Master of the Galactic Republic living during the Cold War. He fought in the Battle of Kuat during the Galactic War, where he was killed aboard the Kuat Defensive Station.
Master Khoris appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Starfighter expansion, added to the game with Update 2.6.
